---
id: list-secrets
title: "ListSecrets"
description: "Retrieves a paginated list of all secrets in the workspace with optional filtering and sorting. All secret values are masked."

<Heading

  children={"ListSecrets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/secrets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of all secrets in the workspace with optional filtering and sorting. All secret values are masked.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"count","in":"query","description":"Number of items to be returned in each page.","schema":{"type":"number","description":"Number of items to be returned in each page."}},{"name":"page","in":"query","description":"Page number to retrieve, starting from 1.","schema":{"type":"number","description":"Page number to retrieve, starting from 1."}},{"name":"all","in":"query","description":"If true, returns all requested items, ignoring pagination parameters page and count.","schema":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, returns all requested items, ignoring pagination parameters page and count."}},{"name":"name","in":"query","description":"Filter by secret name.","style":"form","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Filter by secret name."},"explode":true},{"name":"created_by","in":"query","description":"Filter by the user who created the secret.","style":"form","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Filter by the user who created the secret."},"explode":true},{"name":"last_modified_by","in":"query","description":"Filter by the user who last modified the secret.","style":"form","schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Filter by the user who last modified the secret."},"explode":true},{"name":"sort_on","in":"query","description":"Field to sort the results by.","schema":{"type":"string","enum":["name","created_at","last_modified_at"],"title":"SecretSortOn"}},{"name":"sort_by","in":"query","description":"Sort order (ascending or descending).","schema":{"type":"string","description":"Sort order enumeration for list operations.","enum":["desc","asc"],"title":"SortBy"}},{"name":"x-org-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"name":"x-workspace","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"ListSecrets 200 response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"total_pages":{"type":"number"},"total_items":{"type":"number"},"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Response structure for secret operations. Secret values are never returned for security.","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"change_reason":{"type":"string"},"created_by":{"type":"string"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"last_modified_by":{"type":"string"},"last_modified_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"required":["change_reason","created_at","created_by","description","last_modified_at","last_modified_by","name"],"title":"SecretResponse"}}},"required":["data","total_items","total_pages"],"title":"ListSecretsResponseContent"}}}},"500":{"description":"InternalServerError 500 response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"InternalServerErrorResponseContent"}}}}}}
